participants.name: David Goodman
participants.title: Engineering & Technology Recruiter at PDS Tech

messages.message:
Re: Sr. Drupal Developer

Hi Brian, 

I found your profile on LinkedIn, and thought I'd reach out to network. You have a fantastic background in front end Drupal Development, and I thought you might know of someone with a similar background to yourself, who might be looking for a career move.

PDS Tech is a national recruiting firm focused primarily on providing Technology talent to Aerospace and Government. 

If there's anything I can do for you in return please let me know. I would love an opportunity to return the favor.

Best wishes,

David Goodman
480.620.2744 | dgoodman@pdstech.com
It is very much like a position that closed weeks ago. Technically indistinguishable.
Hmm. Drupal isn't fun though... It's actually the opposite of fun. Hook systems suck.
In that case, you're in luck.
